title: Where is Riot Toxichawk ?
body: This may be a bit irreverent, but recently Riot Toxichawk's social media i.e Facebook, twitter have been deactivated and he has not been on league in a while. Just wondering where he has gone what he is up to.

replies.body:
He got gold,

No longer talks to bronze/silver.
He changed his name to HappyPidgeon.
